mapper.insert: insert all into member (EMAIL, NAME, PASS, ID, JOINTYPE, MEMBERTYPE, emailConfirm) values(#{email}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{id}, #{joinType}, #{memberType}, #{emailConfirm}) into member_detail(ADDR1, ADDR2, ZIPCODE, JOINDATE, EMAIL, BIRTH, TEL, GENDER) values(#{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcode}, sysdate, #{email}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{gender}) select * from dual
mapper.select: select * from member m, member_detail d where m.email = d.email and m.email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member_detail set addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, zipcode = #{zipcode} where email = #{email}
